title: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
OB: When navigating to the hyperlink builder in the settings menu, the title is not displayed as 'Hyperlink Options'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be displayed as 'Hyperlink Options', regardless of the settings.
SR: Ensure that the title of the hyperlink builder is consistently displayed as 'Hyperlink Options'.
